add_library(fls_lyt
        OBJECT
        buf.cpp
        #[[]]
)

set(FASTLANES_OBJECT_FILES
        ${FASTLANES_OBJECT_FILES} $<TARGET_OBJECTS:fls_lyt>
        PARENT_SCOPE)

if (ENABLE_IWYU)
    set_property(TARGET fls_lyt PROPERTY CXX_INCLUDE_WHAT_YOU_USE ${iwyu_path})
endif ()

target_link_libraries(fls_lyt
        PUBLIC
        FastLanes::headers
)
